mapper.sql: FLIGHT_INFO_ID, FLIGHT_DATE, FLIGHT_NO, DEPARTURE_AIRPORT, DEPARTURE_ABBR, ARRIVAL_AIRPORT, ARRIVAL_ABBR, STD, STA, AIRCRAFT_TYPE, REG_CODE, ETD, ATD, ETA, ATA, DIV1AIRPORT4CODE, DIV2AIRPORT4CODE, DIV1CITYNAME, DIV2CITYNAME, VAL_MADEPAC, VAL_UPLOADPAC, BOARDINGTIME, CLOSINGTIME, PASSENGERS, DEP3CODE, ARR3CODE, RELEASE_ID, CANCELFLIGHT, CREW_LINK_LINE, STEW_LINK_LINE
mapper.insert:
Oracle
insert into FLIGHT_INFO (FLIGHT_DATE, FLIGHT_NO, DEPARTURE_AIRPORT, DEPARTURE_ABBR, ARRIVAL_AIRPORT, ARRIVAL_ABBR, STD, STA, AIRCRAFT_TYPE, REG_CODE, ETD, ATD, ETA, ATA, DIV1AIRPORT4CODE, DIV2AIRPORT4CODE, DIV1CITYNAME, DIV2CITYNAME, VAL_MADEPAC, VAL_UPLOADPAC, BOARDINGTIME, CLOSINGTIME, PASSENGERS, DEP3CODE, ARR3CODE, RELEASE_ID, CANCELFLIGHT, CREW_LINK_LINE, STEW_LINK_LINE ) values (#{flightDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{flightNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departureAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departureAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrivalAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrivalAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{std,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sta,jdbcType=DATE}, #{aircraftType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etd,jdbcType=DATE}, #{atd,jdbcType=DATE}, #{eta,jdbcType=DATE}, #{ata,jdbcType=DATE}, #{div1airport4code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{div2airport4code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{div1cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{div2cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valMadepac,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{valUploadpac,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{boardingtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{closingtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{passengers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dep3code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arr3code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cancelflight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{crewLinkLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stewLinkLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.update:
update FLIGHT_INFO
FLIGHT_DATE = #{flightDate,jdbcType=DATE},
FLIGHT_NO = #{flightNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTURE_AIRPORT = #{departureAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTURE_ABBR = #{departureAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARRIVAL_AIRPORT = #{arrivalAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARRIVAL_ABBR = #{arrivalAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STD = #{std,jdbcType=DATE},
STA = #{sta,jdbcType=DATE},
AIRCRAFT_TYPE = #{aircraftType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_CODE = #{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETD = #{etd,jdbcType=DATE},
ATD = #{atd,jdbcType=DATE},
ETA = #{eta,jdbcType=DATE},
ATA = #{ata,jdbcType=DATE},
DIV1AIRPORT4CODE = #{div1airport4code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIV2AIRPORT4CODE = #{div2airport4code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIV1CITYNAME = #{div1cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIV2CITYNAME = #{div2cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VAL_MADEPAC = #{valMadepac,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VAL_UPLOADPAC = #{valUploadpac,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BOARDINGTIME = #{boardingtime,jdbcType=DATE},
CLOSINGTIME = #{closingtime,jdbcType=DATE},
PASSENGERS = #{passengers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEP3CODE = #{dep3code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARR3CODE = #{arr3code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELEASE_ID = #{releaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CANCELFLIGHT = #{cancelflight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREW_LINK_LINE = #{crewLinkLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STEW_LINK_LINE = #{stewLinkLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where FLIGHT_INFO_ID = #{flightInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update FLIGHT_INFO set FLIGHT_DATE = #{flightDate,jdbcType=DATE}, FLIGHT_NO = #{flightNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTURE_AIRPORT = #{departureAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTURE_ABBR = #{departureAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARRIVAL_AIRPORT = #{arrivalAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARRIVAL_ABBR = #{arrivalAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STD = #{std,jdbcType=DATE}, STA = #{sta,jdbcType=DATE}, AIRCRAFT_TYPE = #{aircraftType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_CODE = #{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETD = #{etd,jdbcType=DATE}, ATD = #{atd,jdbcType=DATE}, ETA = #{eta,jdbcType=DATE}, ATA = #{ata,jdbcType=DATE}, DIV1AIRPORT4CODE = #{div1airport4code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIV2AIRPORT4CODE = #{div2airport4code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIV1CITYNAME = #{div1cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIV2CITYNAME = #{div2cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VAL_MADEPAC = #{valMadepac,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VAL_UPLOADPAC = #{valUploadpac,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BOARDINGTIME = #{boardingtime,jdbcType=DATE}, CLOSINGTIME = #{closingtime,jdbcType=DATE}, PASSENGERS = #{passengers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEP3CODE = #{dep3code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARR3CODE = #{arr3code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELEASE_ID = #{releaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CANCELFLIGHT = #{cancelflight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREW_LINK_LINE = #{crewLinkLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STEW_LINK_LINE = #{stewLinkLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where FLIGHT_INFO_ID = #{flightInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select f.FLIGHT_NO,f.DEPARTURE_AIRPORT,f.ARRIVAL_AIRPORT, "TO_CHAR"(f.STD,'MM-DD hh24:mi') STD,"TO_CHAR"(f.STA,'MM-DD hh24:mi') STA, (select AIRPORT_NAME from AIRPORT a where a.AIRPORT4CODE = f.DEPARTURE_AIRPORT ) DEPARTUREAIRPORTNAME, (select AIRPORT_NAME from AIRPORT a where a.AIRPORT4CODE = f.ARRIVAL_AIRPORT ) ARRIVALAIRPORTNAME from FLIGHT_INFO f

select f.FLIGHT_NO,f.DEPARTURE_AIRPORT,f.ARRIVAL_AIRPORT, "TO_CHAR"(f.STD,'MM-DD hh24:mi') STD,"TO_CHAR"(f.STA,'MM-DD hh24:mi') STA, (select AIRPORT_NAME from AIRPORT a where a.AIRPORT4CODE = f.DEPARTURE_AIRPORT ) DEPARTUREAIRPORTNAME, (select AIRPORT_NAME from AIRPORT a where a.AIRPORT4CODE = f.ARRIVAL_AIRPORT ) ARRIVALAIRPORTNAME from FLIGHT_INFO f where ( f.DEPARTURE_AIRPORT = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or f.ARRIVAL_AIRPORT = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
